django-urlify
=============

django-urlify node wrapper for rapid installation

## Installation
``` bash
npm install django-urlify
```

## Usage
``` javascript
urlify = require('django-urlify')
console.log(urlify('превет медвед')) // 'prevet-medved'
console.log(urlify('превет медвед', '.')) // 'prevet.medved'
console.log(urlify('превет медвед', '.', 10)) // 'prevet.med'
```
